creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: black and white striped band with fringe on one end and braided tassel at opposite end; black beaded fabric panel at one end, decorated with beaded flowers and birds in round and tube-shaped beads; contemporary paper sticker: "MADE IN/ GUATEMALA/ 100% COTTON"
dimension: 82 5/8 x 2 5/16 in. (209.87 x 5.87 cm) (without fringe or tassel)
title: Hair band or belt (?)
